metadataAttributes.Title: PMI-ACP® Certification Training Course
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: The PMI-ACP® (Agile Certified Practitioner) training empowers you to become a skilled agile professional with knowledge of a broad range of agile methodologies. ACP is PMI’s fastest-growing certification and recently the PMI-ACP exam has been updated with the addition of the Agile Practice Guide.
